column1: Smoque BBQ////It ain't no Texas bbq
column2: but it sure is good for the midwest! I'd have to say - best bbq in Chicago. Ok fine
column3: not that I've tried all of them in Chicago (I swear)
column5: this is really good and legit stuff guys. Tried most of the meats on the menu - pork ribs fall off the bone
column7: pulled pork melts in your mouth
column8: and the bbq chicken was perfectly cooked
column9: just about! Char grilled skin and errrrthang ;) Comes with sides - baked beans are amazing! Cole slaw and fries aint too shabby either.
